alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Franklin; Furnas; Gosper; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued April 23 at 2:59AM CDT until April 23 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 5 AM CDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive. People should avoid being outside around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Dawson; Franklin; Furnas; Gosper; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps; Sherman; Valley
